author: lundblad
msg: Update build system to validate .po files.
* configure.in: Chedk for GNU gettext and.
(MSGFMTFLAGS): New substitution variable: -c if GNU gettext, else empty.
* Makefile.in: Use MSGFMTFLAGS in msgfmt invocations.

msg: * STATUS: Fix sussman's typo from r10465

author: lundblad
msg: * po/pl.po: Add Last-translator header and remove newlines from plural

author: breser
msg: Check if we're on cygwin and set LT_NO_UNDEFINED to -no-undefined.

author: sussman
msg: Followup to r10467:  make /trunk compile on win32 again.
instead of checking directly against EWOULDBLOCK.
